Moonflower Inspiration.name: Moonflower Inspiration
Moonflower Inspiration.flavor: Shafts of moonlight streak from above, seeping into the minds and bodies of all of those around you. Your allies are healed, and your enemies are tormented.
Moonflower Inspiration.attack: Charisma vs. Fortitude, Reflex, or Will (your choice for each target)
Moonflower Inspiration.onHit:
If your attack was vs. Fortitude, the target is weakened (save ends).
    If your attack was vs. Reflex, the target is immobilized (save ends).
    If your attack was vs. Will, the target is dazed (save ends).
Moonflower Inspiration.effect:
Each ally in the burst regains hit points equal to your Intelligence modifier.
    Each time an ally ends his or her turn adjacent to an enemy that has not yet saved against this power, he or she regains that number of hit points again.

Blinding Beacon.name: Blinding Beacon
Blinding Beacon.flavor: Blinding light erupts around your foe, searing your enemy in a flood of wild energy.
Blinding Beacon.onHit: 1d10 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn. While blinded, the target also shines, giving off bright light in a 5-square radius.

Feylights.name: Feylights
Feylights.flavor: Spheres of silver flame dance around you, driving back shadows and revealing hidden foes.
Feylights.effect: You create a zone of bright light until the end of your next turn. All insubstantial creatures lose that quality while in the zone. All effects of concealment (including invisibility) are negated within the zone.
Feylights.sustainMinor: The zone lasts until the end of your next turn, but its radius shrinks by 1 square (to a minimum of burst 1).
Feylights.sustainStandard: The zone lasts until the end of your next turn, and its radius increases by 1 square.
